attributes.action: Help apprentices by allowing HMRC mileage tax relief on travel to  college.
attributes.background: Apprentices who drive to college cannot claim tax back on this expense as HMRC's 45p rate doesn't extend to cover this travel - details can be found at www.workmileagetaxrebate.co.uk. Despite typically lower wages, apprentices have to cover the cost of travel to their workplace net of tax.
